author: Ciaran Mullooly
title: Roscommon man, 82, speaks of Covid-19 recovery
description: An 82-year-old man, who was hospitalised with Covid-19 for ten days, said that elderly people should remain as positive as possible in their outlook during the present crisis as he survived the illness.
content:
An 82-year-old man, who was hospitalised with Covid-19 for ten days, said that elderly people should remain as positive as possible in their outlook during the crisis as he survived the illness.
